member.name: T:XmobiTea.Binary.IBinaryConverter
member.summary: Defines methods for serializing and deserializing objects to and from binary data.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Binary.IBinaryConverter.Serialize``1(``0)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a byte array.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to serialize.
member.returns: A byte array representing the serialized object.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Binary.IBinaryConverter.Serialize``1(System.IO.Stream,``0)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object and writes the binary data to a stream.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to serialize.
member.param: The stream to which the binary data is written.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Binary.IBinaryConverter.Deserialize``1(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes an object of the specified type from a stream.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to deserialize.
member.param: The stream from which the object is deserialized.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Binary.IBinaryConverter.Deserialize``1(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Deserializes an object of the specified type from a byte array.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to deserialize.
member.param: The byte array containing the serialized object.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Binary.IBinaryConverter.TryParse``1(System.IO.Stream,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to parse and deserialize an object of the specified type from a stream.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to deserialize.
member.param: The stream from which the object is deserialized.
When this method returns, contains the deserialized object of type if the parsing succeeded, or the default value of if the parsing failed.
member.returns: true if the parsing succeeded; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:XmobiTea.Binary.IBinaryConverter.TryParse``1(System.Byte[],``0@)
member.summary: Tries to parse and deserialize an object of the specified type from a byte array.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to deserialize.
member.param: The byte array containing the serialized object.
When this method returns, contains the deserialized object of type if the parsing succeeded, or the default value of if the parsing failed.
member.returns: true if the parsing succeeded; otherwise, false.
